This will be a simple list where people can post any small bigfixes and adjustments they'd like to be made to the game. I will update the list in this top post.

 

Bugfixes:

fix the bug where when entering a save the camera angle becomes locked at a wierd angle and all buttons become unclickable

Adjustments:

This seems redundant due to the Squad Bugtracker

Nice thought though.

12 hours ago, quasarrgames said:

fix the bug where when entering a save the camera angle becomes locked at a wierd angle and all buttons become unclickable

In case you're looking for a solution to that, it's usually caused by alt-tabbing out of the game while it's loading. Two fixes: don't do that, or Mod-F12 into the debug menu and clear the input locks.
